Posts.Content: If your work are following current COSHH regulations you should not be using any caustic substances regardless of your cancer diagnosis without the proper protective clothing. You should also have been provided with training and the correct data sheets for each product, it is there legal responsibility. For further advice have a look at the HSE website: http://www.hse.gov.uk/coshh/ L4W
Posts.Title: ph levels in cleaning products
